title: A 15-Minute City Without Cars or Commutes
itunes:title: A 15-Minute City Without Cars or Commutes
description:
Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU, discusses Covid cases increasing in NYC and encouraging vaccine news. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg CityLab Reporter Laura Bliss talk about the story “A 15-Minute City Without Cars or Commutes Emerges as New Utopia.” Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Max Abelson Max Abelson walks through the story “Trump Ripped His Oval Office Defense From His Business Playbook.” Bloomberg News Media Reporter Gerry Smith talks about President Trump’s “war on Fox News.” And we Drive to the Close with Doug Ciocca, CEO at Kavar Capital.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
